mcq.statement: Choose an option that is correct according to the standard use of English: A cup of tea is hanging on the hook in the kitchen

options.a: A cup of tea is hanging on the hook in the kitchen.
options.b: A tea cup is hanging on the hook in the kitchen
options.c: A tea cup is hanging over the hook in the kitchen.
options.d: A tea's cup is hanging on the hook in the kitchen.
